marklogic.body: Is anyone still on suicide watch...lol Bring in a decent tender a couple of veterans and this team would have played out of their funk, it may still have cost us that elusive Spot but I believe they would of been out early enough to still be pushing. Fuck the pressure of the worlds largest hockey market must have scared the shit out these kids. I think its a manageable mistake but a big mistake none the less, not to even bring up half the players not living up to expectation or even close to expectations is not the way I see this team moving forward, I can not see this happening again in the near future. But again who would even predict things could get this tough on any team should play the lottery three fold. I can see a few moves in the Off season and maybe a trade request or two.
